law.catch_line: Structures used for shows and exhibitions, requirements.
law.text: All structures or parts of structures used, or intended to be used, for boxing, kickboxing, mixed martial arts, and wrestling shows and exhibitions, shall be properly ventilated and provided with fire exits and fire escapes, if need be, and shall conform to the laws, ordinances and regulations pertaining to buildings in the city where situated.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 20.
